prologue_intro: Where am I? What happened to me? Who am I?
This forest... it is cursed. Grave markers and shadows everywhere.
Something feels different... My hand aches for a blade.
eileen_appears: Eileen: I found you in this cursed forest. Your wounds are many.
Arthur: Eileen... why did you risk coming here?
boss_encounter: A massive corrupted figure rises before you...
You dare challenge the ancient darkness? How foolish you are!
internal_monologue: It wears armor. Deep wounds. It was once... human.
But now it is consumed by darkness. No eyes remain. Only crimson essence.
I must end this. For Eileen. For everyone.

memory_fragment.name: Memory Fragment
memory_fragment.description: A shard of forgotten memories. It warms your hand and whispers to your soul.

healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: Restores 50 health. Tastes of herbs and copper.

dark_artifact.name: Dark Artifact
dark_artifact.description: Whispers of ancient darkness. Holding it for too long makes breathing difficult.

blade_shard.name: Blade Shard
blade_shard.description: Fragments of a legendary sword. It still hungers.
